name: Mending Broken Hearts letterpress card for Japan Earthquake & Tsunami Relief
description: Now Shipping!! The recent events in Japan have had a profound impact on all of us. Watching the coverage on television and the internet made me want to do something that would benefit the relief efforts in Japan. I designed this card to show how the devastating events in Japan have broken hearts. Thousands of people have been impacted by these disasters but we can come together to begin the process of mending those broken hearts. The entire sale price (excluding shipping and handling fees) will be donated to the American Red Cross for relief efforts in Japan. I am donating my time, talent, energy and the materials used to create this card. Let's help make a difference for those who have been directly impacted by these events. Order a card, or two, today. Share with a friend and urge them to do the same. ORDER TODAY. Quantities may be limited. Payments are processed through PayPal. You can use your existing PayPal account or pay as a guest. This transaction will appear on your statement as PayPal *NEWLEAFBOOK. New Leaf Letterpress is a division of New Leaf Books & Boxes. All orders will ship via USPS First Class Mail. More images can be seen [here].

options.name: A6 Letterpress card with envelope (6.25 x 4.5" folded)

name: Waterfall Letterpress Save the date card, Set of 100
description: A modern interpretation of a waterfall for the couple ready to take the plunge. This playful save-the-date card is the perfect way to let your guests know of your upcoming wedding celebration. This item is for a set of 100 cards and envelopes. Save-the-date card is printed on 100% cotton rag Crane Lettra 300gsm paper with coordinating European-style (pointed flap) envelopes. This item is for a set of 100 letterpress printed cards and envelopes with return address imprint. Card size is 4.5×6.25”. Customize ink colors, typefaces, wording and envelope color at no additional charge. Other options available for an additional charge. Please inquire for details and pricing. Inital proofs sent within 3-5 business days upon receipt of payment and all order information. Delivery of completed invitations is 4-6 weeks upon signed approval of final proof. Rush service is available for an additional 50% surcharge. Standard, insured ground shipping included at no additional charge for all orders shipping within the USA. Expedited and international shipping available upon request. For more information or to customize quantity or accessories email steven@newleafletterpress.com
